channel.description: Recent content in Distractible on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Evil League of Evil | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Let out your best maniacal laugh for Bob, Mark, and Wade as they explore their villainous alter egos and compete for a seat on the “Evil League of Evil!” Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: "Not" "Financial" "Advice" | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Mark, Bob, and Wade are gonna show you how to make serious bank and get rich fast with these totally legit and definitely NOT illegal tips. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Bits That Didn't Fits [Bonus Episode] | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description It’s time to finally open up the Distractible Vault, and take a peak at some unused bits that never saw the light of day… until now. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Live, Laugh, Lose | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Wade, Bob, and Mark talk about how they balance stress, relaxation, and work ethic in their day to day lives. Also everything Mark says is wrong, and we have science to prove it (we think). Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: You're Dumb, We're Smart, Here's Why | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Hear us out. And when we’re done, don’t say anything. Bob, Mark, and Wade discuss their philosophical opinions on past, present, and future generations. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: PowerWash Pals: Tyler [Bonus Episode] | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Is power washing a sport? Either way, the hosts of “Go! My Favorite Sport Team” get down and dirty, then clean in this new episode of PowerWash Pals. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Return Of The Gingerdead Man | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Wade, Bob, and Mark put holiday characters head to head with each other, to see who comes out on top. But who could possibly beat the derisiveness of the clever confectionery that is the “Gingerdead Man?” Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Actually Nothing | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Look deep into our eyes… what do you see? Nothing? Yep, that pretty much sums up today’s episode. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Appeasing Our A.I. Overlords | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description A.I. is going to take over sooner or later, so the guys may as well use it’s suggestions for episode topics. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

Plus the guys reminisce about the nostalgic things they miss from their younger-years. After all, they are getting older. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description The guys talk Mark’s volcano scare, bad airports, and the voices animals would have if they could speak. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Worth It | Distractible
item.description: Podcast Description Yes, Mark has obsessions. And many times, those obsessions are expensive. Today we find out if Bob and Wade have any obsessions that they feel are worth the questionable cost. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Bob makes Mark and Wade take personality tests. They discuss how accurate their results are and if they were even worth doing in the first place… Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description The wickedly talented Wade enlists his contestants to find their favorite giraffes– I mean gaffes, sorry. Find out if Mark and Bob actually listen to their host or if the episode becomes one big gaffe in itself. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Mark elicits Bob and Wade to give him advice for a variety of average problems. Of course, they can’t give true legal council, so they give illegal or otherwise unscrupulous solutions. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Transcript
